name: English with Max
profile:
Hello!
I'm an English teacher and translator. I'm a native English speaker from Australia (with a very "neutral" accent 😉). I love learning languages - I speak French, German, Spanish, and some Italian, Indonesian and Portuguese - and I hope I can help you learn my native language. Language isn't just a tool. Let's have fun with it!

Remember that English subtitles are available for all videos.
